test-case.name: ApplyingADiscountToTheShoppingCart("Beanie",null)
test-case.output: BROWSER env not set: Setting to Edge.. Given I am on the eCommerce Website -> done: LoginSteps.GivenIAmOnTheECommerceWebsite() (0.7s) And I am logged in as a registered user Successfully Logged In Navigated to the Cart Page Check Cart Cleared -> done: LoginSteps.GivenIAmLoggedInAsARegisteredUser() (1.6s) When I add 'Beanie' into my cart Navigated to the Shop Page Verified that the 'Beanie' item exists on the shop page Added the 'Beanie' item to the cart -> done: CouponDiscountSteps.WhenIAddAnIntoMyCart("Beanie") (1.6s) And I apply the coupon code 'edgewords' to the cart Verified that the 'Beanie' item is in the cart Valid Coupon Applied: 'edgewords'.. -> done: CouponDiscountSteps.WhenIApplyTheCouponCodeToTheCart("edgewords") (5.4s) Then I recieve '15'% discount off my total, excluding shipping Applied a 15% discount Verified that the discount was correctly applied to the cart.. Expected total value: £19.25, Actual total value: £19.25 Attaching 'Coupon_Discount_Price' screenshot to report -> done: CouponDiscountSteps.ThenIRecieveDiscountOffMyTotalExcludingShipping(15) (0.2s) Navigated to Account page Successfully Logged Out Test Passed & Completed!

test-case.name: OrderCheckoutProcessAndVerifyInOrderHistory("Check","Hoodie",null)
test-case.output: BROWSER env not set: Setting to Edge.. Given I am on the eCommerce Website -> done: LoginSteps.GivenIAmOnTheECommerceWebsite() (0.7s) And I am logged in as a registered user Successfully Logged In Navigated to the Cart Page Check Cart Cleared -> done: LoginSteps.GivenIAmLoggedInAsARegisteredUser() (3.7s) Given that the cart contains 'Hoodie' Navigated to the Shop Page Verified that the 'Hoodie' item exists on the shop page Added the 'Hoodie' item to the cart -> done: CheckoutProcessSteps.GivenThatTheCartContains("Hoodie") (1.6s) When I proceed to checkout Navigated to Checkout page -> done: CheckoutProcessSteps.WhenIProceedToCheckout() (0.5s) And I provide the billing details: --- table step argument --- | first name | last name | address | city | postcode | phone number | email | | Abid | Miah | 17 Sui Lane | London | SW19 2JY | 07365827365 | test.email@nfocus.co.uk | Billing Details Populated.. Validated Billing Details have actually been populated -> done: CheckoutProcessSteps.WhenIProvideTheBillingDetails(<table>) (0.9s) When I place the order with 'Check' payment Cheque Payment Selected Order Placed.. New Order Number: 10565 Attaching 'New_Order_Number' screenshot to report -> done: CheckoutProcessSteps.WhenIPlaceTheOrder("Check") (1.4s) Then the order should appear in my accounts order history Navigated to Account page Navigated to All Orders on account page Verified that the order numbers match from checkout page.. Expected order number: 10565, Actual order number: 10565 Attaching 'Orders' screenshot to report -> done: CheckoutProcessSteps.ThenTheOrderShouldAppearInMyAccountsOrderHistory() (1.2s) Successfully Logged Out Test Passed & Completed!
